str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Free, delivered from obligation. Probably from the alternate of erchomai; unrestrained, i.e. not a slave, or exempt.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To enslave. From doulos; to enslave.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To gain, acquire, win (over), avoid loss. From kerdos; to gain.
Or neuter pleion, or pleon comparative of polus; more in quantity, number, or quality; also the major portion.
